hero.title: Welcome to
hero.subtitle: A clean starter template with theme support, internationalization, and Radix UI colors. Ready to build something amazing.

routing.title: File-Based Routing
routing.description: React Router v7 with nested layouts, loaders, and actions. Type-safe routing out of the box.

themes.title: Theme Support
themes.description: Light, dark, and system themes powered by next-themes. Radix UI color scales for consistent design.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Built-in i18n with react-i18next. Locale-prefixed routes and language switching ready to go.
